pr_title: Fix no data bug of oap self observability instance_metrics_second_aggregation metrics.

timeline.message: Fix no data bug of oap self observability instance_metrics_second_aggregation metrics.

timeline.author: wu-sheng
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -69,7 +69,7 @@
                                                           .getService(MetricsCreator.class);
         aggregationCounter = metricsCreator.createCounter(
             "metrics_aggregation", "The number of rows in aggregation",
-            new MetricsTag.Keys("metricName", "level", "dimensionality"), new MetricsTag.Values(modelName, "1", "min")
+            new MetricsTag.Keys("metricName", "level", "dimensionality"), new MetricsTag.Values(modelName, "1", "minute")

replies.bodyText: @hanahmily You made the decision. I am not sure whether this is a suitable change. Basically, we don't have code style guidance about this.
replies.author: wu-sheng

replies.bodyText: From my perspective, some other references should be updated accordingly. One I can find is grafana.json at docs folder. But it's a bit overkill. I prefer to leave it alone
replies.author: hanahmily

replies.bodyText: @Ax1an Pleasw update the Grafana config to adopt this.
replies.author: wu-sheng

replies.bodyText:
From my perspective, minute is better than min. Because DownSampling enum is minute.
I prefer to adjust grafana.json.
replies.author: Ax1an

replies.bodyText: After a talk with sheng, I agree with renaming it. Pls, to search and update other possible references more than grafana.json. Thanks.
replies.author: hanahmily

replies.bodyText: @hanahmily I updated oap.yaml. Other references were not found.
replies.author: Ax1an

replies.bodyText: These are the metrics in grafana after this PR changed.
replies.author: Ax1an

timeline.bodyText: Why remove all these? The downsampling is important.
timeline.author: wu-sheng

replies.author: Ax1an
